title: Online Supermarket
description: An end to end supermarket website, with routing and a cart. Initially made this right after the trivia project, updated it recently.

title: Blog
description: My first full-stack project, using the MERN stack. A very simple, barebones blog. At this point I realized I knew very little about databases, APIs and routing, so this was a way to familiarize myself. Creating a post requires authorization, demo credentials are email: admin123@gmail.com pass: admin123.

title: Trivia
description: My first React project, a simple Trivia using the open trivia database API, updated recently to make it responsive.
